articles.description: Tech expert Krishan Sharma gets hands on with the Huawei P40 Pro. His review highlights some obvious pros, but some less obvious cons. Get the details.
articles.content: Last year’s P30 Pro set a benchmark in smartphone photography and now Huawei is back with the follow-up act in the P40 Pro. The quad camera array packs an even larger image sensor this time around and 5G as well as a host of other improvements. But is it enou… [+6499 chars]

articles.title: The eye-popping visual cortex research that Neuralink isn't doing - Inverse
articles.description: Researchers have developed a new form of brain stimulation that can help blind participants "see" objects.
articles.content: Millions of Americans struggle with visual impairment, ranging from partial to total loss of sight, which can negatively affect their ability to easily navigate a world designed predominately for those with sight. But a new technique could restore sight direc… [+5813 chars]
